SRI.SHAJIN S.HAMEED RESPONDENT/STATE: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE DEPUTY POLICE COMMISSIONER THIRUVANANTHAPURAM CITY REPRESENTED THROUGH PUBLIC PROSECUTOR HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMI.S.HYMA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 01-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: | pee ae | " G "1 rk : Blt a 2014/KER/58 Crl.MC.No. 5744 of 2013 () APPENDIX PETITIONERS ANNEXURES ANNEXURE A COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 598/2009 OF MEDICAL COLLEGE POLICE STATION ANNEXURE B COPY OF THE FINAL GRADE REPORT DATED 5/8/2013 ISSUED FROM THE SREE SANKARACHARYA UNIVERSITY OF SANSKRIT, KALADY RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS : NIL \\ TRUE COPY \\ PA TO JUDGE jm/ ise a 2014/KER/S58 HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. Crl.M.C No.5744 of 2013 Dated this the 01* day of January, 2014. ORDER Petitioner is the third accused in C.C No. 595/2009 on the file of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate Court, Thiruvananthapuram. The offence alleged is punishable under Section 16 of the Kerala Anti-Social Activities Prevention Act, 2007 and Section 34 of IPC. The cognizance of the case was taken on 21.12.2009. All the accused appeared and took bail on 15.092011. The Crl.M.C is filed seeking a direction to the Addl.Chief Judicial Magistrate, Thiruvananthapuram to expedite the trial in C. C No. 595/2009 and to dispose of the same at an earlier date. 2. The Addl. Chief Judicial Magistrate, Thiruvananthapuram in the report dated 18.11.2013 reported that the case is posted to 18.02.2014 for framing charge that, prosecution has cited 27 witnesses in the said case and that four months time is necessary for disposal of case after framing charge. In the light of the report, the Crl.M.C is disposed of directing the Addl.Chief Judicial Magistrate, Thiruvananthapuram to expedite the trial in C.C No. 595/09 and to dispose of the case within a period of four months from the date of framing the charge. HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE. Isn
